ack.title: Acknowledgements
ack.p: We give special thanks to Dr. Gregory Sempowski, Director of the Duke Global Health Research Building, a.k.a. Regional Biocontainment Laboratory (RBL), division of the Duke Human Vaccine Institute for providing the SARS-CoV-2 RNA. The following reagent was deposited by the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention and obtained through BEI Resources, NIAID, NIH: Genomic RNA from SARS-Related Coronavirus 2, Isolate USA-WA1/2020, NR-52285.
